description: There's no description of where this is located or how to run it (I know it needs to be run from a terminal). There is a directory under the SNAP folder but apparently no binary? If it had this and was usable it would be 5 stars.
Attempted install on UBUNTU 20.04, and it "istalled" but I could not find it anywhere, nothing in "applications" nor as a Shell-command ??
does not work. does not execute
Tried to install on ubuntu 20.04.3, seemed to work but attempting an iperf command in terminal didn't work. Then I did sudo apt install iperf3 and after that install it worked as desired.

Tryed on 5/07/2022 on Ubuntu 20.04, installed from Ubuntu Software as a snap. The snap has "all" permissions granted (i.e. the 2 permissions that are listed). I did not reboot ;-)
When I invoke iperf or iperf3 in the commandline, I got for instance:
Command 'iperf' not found, but can be installed with: sudo apt install iperf.
